name: Time For Change
description:
A meteorite falls on the ground, you have 15 minutes  to escape. The choice in the game is key, on the way you will come across different characters that you can help if you want, some parts of the city will be inaccessible, and to get to another part of the city you will need to use the red telephone booth. Your mission is to find the yellow phone box, it will direct you to another planet. 

The game has three endings.
